Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights eurostars rome february 2010 staff helpful free internet lobby spacious bathroom clean breakfast ideal variety atmosphere attendent seated guests restaurants professional friendly definitely stay lots restaurants nearby forum colisseum walking distance trevi fountain walk termini train station 10 min

Reviews.Title: “Great location at a great price”
Reviews.Author: JayjayCM
Reviews.Content: searched time hotel price location 10 min walk roman forums 2 streets bars restaurants prices hotel reception friendly helped plan rome pin attractions map telling bus etc hotel bar quiet nice standard double 2 english channels thats probably picky clean bathroom nice talk breakfast people reviewed breakfast american style normal sausages pork ones usual horrible ones abroad weird bacon thats uk mean scrambled egg thats warm stuff cold stuff includes fruit cakes muffins cereal read carefully hotel deserts breakfast usually try deserts breakfast eaten hot stuff sweet tried amazing muffins fresh blueberry day chocolate white chocolate chip muffins tasted hard soft melt mouth tasty try youll amazed cant hotel location 64 bus takes vatican opposite hotel oh tickets bus dont buy newsagents hotel tell staff friendly hotel food nice bad little 2 english channels beans breakfast thats reason im giving 4 5 im fussy bugger hotel £160 3 nights bookingcom amazing value lives 4 star rating rome nightlife dont doesnt exist theres plenty restaurants bars doesnt cater folk

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel , great location”
Reviews.Author: ab500
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel honeymoon hotel cozy extraordinary junior suite decent size paying location hotel train sation 5 walk hotel plenty cabs available walking rome spanish steps coliseum reach overall rome experience hotel bad

Reviews.Title: “Great location, average staff”
Reviews.Author: colitar
Reviews.Content: location walking distance bus subway vatican bus stop vatican street didnt reserve breakfast happy choice street theres cafe breakfast half price waiters helpfull food staff professional helpfull 4 hotel ok didnt spend time hotel reception computers free internet buy wifi cards reception desk defenately recommend hotel visit rome

Reviews.Title: “Well positioned hotel for sightseeing”
Reviews.Author: AucklandTripper
Reviews.Content: hotel actually downside bag set stairs lift staff extremely helpful courteous stayed quiet appointed reasonable size shower smallish weigh 100 kg able wash little feel weighed plus strangely actual bathroom breakfast ok call fantastic day decided bacon sausage eggs mistake taste eggs bad smell stuck continental type breakfast coffee coffee machine expect hotel hotel main shopping strip sales january supermarket road plenty eat walking distance trajans column road major attractions 10 20 minute walk vatican metro road hotel journeyed italy train train station road 10 minutes walk taxi offered train station 15 euros 2 3 blocks using train system italy fun wife mid late fifties enjoyed doing ourself worry tours buses tip learn little language try speak italian love doors little extras free dinner glass
